title: Ticking Hearts and Butterflies
body:
[C] Staring at [Em] you
[Am] Making my [Em] choice – it’s [C] you [Em][Am]
It’s [Em] always been you
[C] Pretty nervous [Em] conversation
[Am] Everybody [Em] notice but [C] you [Em][Am]
Staring [Em] back at me

  It’s [F] magical 
  It’s [C] beautiful 
  It’s [Em] you and me
  It is [Am] love, love, love
  [F] Magical
  [C] Beautiful [Em][Am]

[C] Ticking hearts and [Em] butterflies
You [Am] color my world
It [Em] is for real
But [C] seems like dream
And [Em] all the time
We [Am] cross each other [C] mind

  It’s [F] magical 
  It’s [C] beautiful 
  It’s [Em] you and me
  It is [Am] love, love, love
  [F] Magical
  [C] Beautiful [Em][Am]
bodyLyrics:
Staring at you
Making my choice – it’s you 
It’s always been you
Pretty nervous conversation
Everybody notice but you 
Staring back at me

It’s magical 
It’s beautiful 
It’s you and me
It is love, love, love
Magical
Beautiful 

Ticking hearts and butterflies
You color my world
It is for real
But seems like dream
And all the time
We cross each other mind

It’s magical 
It’s beautiful 
It’s you and me
It is love, love, love
Magical
Beautiful
